basics.name: Engineer
basics.label: Regional Engineering Manager, Director
basics.summary: Over 25 years' experience delivering high-profile ITS/SCADA projects for the Transportation and Water/Waste Water industries. Expertise includes; technical solution architecting and cost estimating, mission critical ITS/SCADA system design and delivery, disaster recovery planning, technical program management, and cross-team leadership.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Currently directing ITS solution deliveries in Texas, Australia, New Zealand, and Chile.
highlights: Technical manager with 90%+ success rate delivering projects on time and under budget.
Proposed innovative solution that resulted in the company being designated as the �highly preferred supplier'
Maximized efficiency and ability to scale by industrializing sales and engineering delivery methodology and deliverables
Originated and spear-headed product innovation ideas, enabling the company to differentiate itself in the ITS/SCADA market.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversaw the engineering department with focus on productivity and project resource planning.
highlights: Beat out the �preferred supplier' in a major civil project bid
Delivery of several high profile, challenging ITS/SCADA projects on time and under budget

education.institution: University of California at Santa Barbara

projects.name: Santiago Chile ITS
projects.description: Directing the in-house development of an advanced traffic incident detection algorithm.

projects.name: CityLink OMCS Upgrade
